title: Restricted from ranked and chat for no reason.
body: Ok, so I was queue'd up in ranked with some god awful players.. I mean god awful. So they kept playing the blame game on me and saying everything was my fault. (I could tell at least two of them were duo queue). So then they type in all chat and say that I am being toxic and to report me.... So now, because of trolls, the oblivious fools who run riot chat restricted and restricted me from ranked games for 37 games...... Seriously, this game has the worst community ever. Even Dota has nicer people. This game makes me sick.

replies.body: I really think Riot needs to hire a large team of people who work the tribunal.  This is why you don't leave it up to a computer, or why you don't leave it up to the same community that causes problems in the first place.

Exactly, the idea of a tribunal being run by the community who obviously started the problems is so stupid. Just starts a hate train and gets people restricted for no reason... Thanks for the support. Hopefully riot will see and lift my restrictions , but I doubt they'll even care. (even though I have spent a few hundred USD on this great game with a god awful community)

It definitely wasn't for that one game that you're clearly gilding the lilly.

You got banned and chat restricted for MULTIPLE valid reports. You don't get that many for a single game.

Right now I have a 71 game chat restriction. Because I earned it.

Why don't you man up, be an adult and either change your behaviour, or accept the punishment without shifting blame.

Maybe you don't understand the power that a report train has. Or do you? I don't know, but I can see you're a little angry so I will leave it at this. There was no reason for me to be chat restricted because of some trolls that have nothing better to do with their time but screw someone over. In all honesty I feel like they should be chat restricted or possibly even banned. (By the way, you must have done some seriously horrible stuff to get restricted for 71 games, so why should I take your advice?) HAVE A NICE DAY :D
